caption:
The photograph captures a semi-arid landscape under a cloudy sky. The foreground is focused on a dry, sandy terrain interspersed with sparse vegetation, consisting of small, resilient plants that appear adapted to harsh conditions. The soil is light-colored, possibly sandy or clay, with visible clumps and various small impressions, suggesting infrequent rainfalls that leave temporary marks.

Moving towards the middle ground, the vegetation becomes slightly denser but still maintains the characteristics of a dry environment. In the distance, a range of low rolling hills or plateaus stretches across the horizon, emphasizing the vastness and open space of the area. The hills are partially covered in vegetation and appear to be more green compared to the sandy foreground.

The backdrop of the scene is dominated by a dramatic sky filled with puffy, cumulus clouds that cast shadows over the landscape, contributing to a dynamic and textured sky, which provides a stark contrast to the dry and rugged terrain below.

Overall, the composition of the photograph, with its focus on the tough, resilient natural environment under a vast, expressive sky, conveys a sense of isolation and the stark beauty of a semi-arid ecosystem.
title: Reclamation effort of strip mined land near Colstrip. Old stock piles are flattened and planted. Dry climate and shallow soil allow only sparse growth.
